basics.name: Lingyu Yue
basics.label: Assistant Researcher
basics.summary: Researcher focused on multiscale modeling and thermal-mechanical simulation of thermoplastic composite materials, as well as the study of aging effects in these materials. Expertise in experimental mechanics and time-dependent material mechanics

work.name: Ningbo Institute of Materials Technology and Engineering, Chinese Academy of Sciences (NIMTE, CAS)
work.summary: Research focus on carbon fiber reinforced thermoplastic composite materials forming process simulation and composite structure design with mechanical performance prediction.
highlights: Carbon Fiber Reinforced Thermoplastic Composite Materials Forming Process Simulation Research
Composite Material Structure Design and Mechanical Performance Prediction

work.name: Multiscale Mechanics Laboratory, Faculty of Engineering, Université de Montréal
work.summary: Research focus on mechanical property characterization and prediction of thermoplastic polymer materials under harsh service conditions.
highlights: Mechanical Property Characterization and Prediction of Thermoplastic Polymer Materials under Harsh Service Conditions

education.institution: École Nationale des Ponts et Chaussées
education.area: Durability of Materials and Energy Structures

education.institution: École Spéciale des Travaux Publics, du Bâtiment et de l'Industrie (ESTP Paris)

publications.name: A dual-scale three-dimensional thermo-viscoelastic model for the hot stamping simulation of thermoplastic composites
publications.summary: Yue, L., Zhu, Y., Liu, D., Yan, C., Chen, G., & Chen, M. (2023). Volume 44(3), 1725-1740. Cited 2 times.

publications.name: On the Strain Measurement for Thermoplastics with Bi-Axial Extensometers in Thermo-Mechanical Testing: A Case of Characterizing Temperature and Physical Aging Effects on Polycarbonate
publications.summary: Yue, L., Jalbert, J., Heuzey, M. C., & Lévesque, M. (2022). Volume 62(9), 1691-1699. Cited 2 times.

publications.summary: Yue, L., Heuzey, M. C., Jalbert, J., & Lévesque, M. (2022). Pages 1-23. Cited 3 times.

publications.name: On the tri-dimensional constitutive theory identification of linearly viscoelastic solids based on Bayesian framework
